titleStmt.title: A Prophecy of England's future happiness, after the time that the contrivers of this Popish plot are cut off the second impression of Dr. Otes his vindication, shewing his evidence is not yet to be baffled by the papists, and the power that instructed him to discover this damnable, popish plot, where observe, none that had a hand in it, or but consented to it, without repentance, shall ever thrive.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
